runs.comm: first ball is close to off stump, but a touch short, McCullum cuts it hard but it is a slow outfield so the ball doesn't go to the boundary
Kulasekara keeps it on offstump to Ryder, who taps it towards mid-on
Ryder looks to flick this one, closes the face too early, gets a leading edge which sails over extra cover
a short-arm jab from Ryder get him a boundary, this was a back of a length ball outside off, Ryder plays it airily over midwicket
slightly fuller this time, offstump line, Ryder defends back to the bowler

good-looking drive from Ryder, right back at the bowler, who sticks his right leg out to block it, the ball dribbles away towards mid-off, McCullum scrambles back to his crease, he had been dismissed off a Ryder straight drive in the first game
a short one, McCiullum rocks back and punches it towards mid-on
Malinga loses his radar, slides that way down the leg side
a corker from Malinga, a slower ball, just short of a length, seams away from Ryder who is beaten as he looks to flick it to the leg side
again it's a slower one that cuts away from Ryder, who dabs it towards cover
bouncer this time, 119kmh, well outside off, doesn't trouble McCullum
short of length on offstump, jabbed back to the left of the bowler, who can't collect the ball on his follow through, could have been a close call if Malinga had picked that one up cleanly
length ball on offstump, 130kmh, Ryder is too early into his stroke, has to check his shot, bottom hand comes off as he plays it towards cover
McCullum defends this offstump delivery towards cover
skips to the leg side, and carves a middle stump delivery towards point
back of the hand slower ball, 118kmh, driven from outside off towards mid-on
McCullum does a Dilscoop! the ball was well outside off, Sangakkara is smacked flush on the helmet, the ball richochets off for a  one-bounce four
length ball on offstump, McCullum plays an orthodox off drive to this one
a bit of width from Kulasekara, McCullum lashes it behind point for a boundary, quick hands from McCullum

back of length ball on middle stump, Ryder is cramped for room, he gets the ball away towards point, where Dilshan is onto it in a flash, a direct hit would have had McCullum yards short of the crease
Malinga persists with the slower deliveries, 124kmh, defended towards the covers by McCullum
this was quick, 145.4kmh, on the pads, Ryder was looking to swing that to behind square leg, is rapped on teh thigh pads, and the ball dribbles towards fine leg
McCullum skips away to the leg side, gives him room to open the face and steer the ball towards third man, he played that one from leg stump
a McCullum trademark, he backs away and absolutely hammers it over backward point, soars over the boundary
Malinga oversteps, McCullum threads it fiercely through extra cover, free-hit coming up
and another off side special from McCullum, timing is a bit off this time though, the fielder just about drags the ball back in yards from the rope
pegs away at the offstump, jabbed towards cover by McCullum
a rough-and-ready heave from McCullum, to a delivery well outside off, doesn't get hold of it so the ball doesn't make it to the boundary

almost a replay of the McCullum dismissal in the previous game, the straight drive crashes into the stump at the non-striker's end, Kulasekara dived and was inches away from getting a hand on that, Ryder was well out of his crease, Kulasekara doesn't even appeal though
yorker length, driven towards cover
shortish ball, sliding down leg, plenty of time for McCullum to swivel and pull that behind square for a boundary
good yorker to end the over, McCullum can only dig it out towards extra cover
starts with a legcutter heading towards leg stump, Ryder back away and drives it to short cover
full and outside off, punched to long-on, the batsmen walk through for a single
McCullum gets forward and defends it towards cover
gets forward and pokes it towards cover
gets down on one knee and sweeps it from outside off towards square leg
on the legstump, Ryder taps it towards midwicket, only three off that over
Ryder backs away and drives it inside out towards sweeper cover to bring up New Zealand's fifty
on the pads, very full, defended towards extra cover
on leg stump again, played a bit uppishly towards mid-on
McCullum dances down the pitch, it was a short ball though, McCullum adjusts and dabs it towards midwicket
Ryder using his feet this time, flicks it towards square leg
McCullum shuffles across the stumps, gets on one knee and sweeps from outside off towards square leg
full and wide, lashed towards extra cover, Jayawardene dives to his right to stop that one
driven back towards the bowler, bounces over Bandara's knee as he looks to field
what a shot from Ryder, gets down on his knee, and dispatches it over midwicket for a big six
full toss on middle and leg, Ryder will be unhappy he couldn't get more than one, his sweep is cut off by Kulasekara at backward square leg
McCullum waltzes down the pitch, and lofts it wide of long-off, stops dead after a couple of bounces
again Ryder skips to the leg side, a low full toss is driven towards mid-on
short and wide, looks to cut it powerfully, misses
swept from outside off towards long leg
fired on leg stump, a cute paddle from Ryder goes very fine down the leg side for a boundary, teasing the fielder who was chasing it
makes room and forces it towards cover, straight at the fielder
again he's down the track, whipped towards square leg
almost a wicket first ball, Ryder looks to launch it over long-off, inside-edges it to the right of the keeper
punched to long-off for an easy single
another single, again to long-on, the batsmen walk through for one
enough of the singles says McCullum, gets on his knee and slams that one over midwicket, that's his 100th boundary in T20s
McCullum's loft lands a few yards short of Rupasinghe at long-off
outside the off stump, Ryder comes on the frontfoot and drives it to deep extra cover
Ryder looks to heave it to midwicket, inside edges it onto his pads

the crowd goes delirious as McCullum chips the ball back to Jayasuriya, he was down the track and checked his attempted on-drive, a leading edge pops up to the bowler, McCullum mises his half-century, he has done his bit though
solid front foot defence from Taylor
full and outside off, Taylor gets forward and taps it towards cover
opens the face and steers it behind point, a tight single is taken
on the pads, Ryder stands tall and punches it to long-on
shot! Ryder bends his knee and mows that over wide long-on
wide outside off, Ryder rocks back and slashes that to point
Taylor pushes a middle stump ball towards mid-on for an easy single
Ryder gets four more, Ryder lashes that off the front foot towards sweeper cover, a bit of sloppy work from Mendis at the boundary
what a stroke to bring up his half-century, full toss on middle and leg, bends low and slog sweeps it into the stands behind midwicket
Taylor misses the slog sweep to a delivery well outside off
quick legbreak from Mendis, close to offstump, Taylor manages to flash that behind backward point
fullish ball on off stump, Taylor pushes it back to the bowler
another legbreak, Taylor waits on the backfoot and drives it towards extra cover
tossed up this time, the offbreak, Ryder was backing away and doesn't connect with the cut
Mendis does the trick, Ryder holes out to extra cover, that ball stopped on Ryder, who was down the track, nowhere near the pitch of the ball, miscues to extra cover
Bandara starts his new spell, with a ball fired into legstump, defended towards the off side
very full delivery, Taylor dries that to long-on to take an easy single
very close to offstump, Guptill gets off the mark by cutting that one towards point
full and on leg stump, Taylor skips outside leg, and muscles it towards wide long-off
beautiful straight drive from Taylor, similar delivery to the previous one, Taylor doesn't go inside out, he aims straight, drills it past the bowler
goes for an almighty heave, misses and is hit on the pads outside legstump, the ball rolls towards square leg
inside egded towards backward square leg for a single
rare full toss from Mendis, flicked towards wide long-on for a couple
ovepitched on offstump, punched towards long-on
quick carrom ball from Mendis, a bit short, Taylor was foxed by that one, he can only push it back to the bowler
squeezed towards point this time, Taylor was charging back for the second, Guptill yells 'Nooooo', that would have been suicide if they went for the second
driven towards extra cover for a single
fired in towards offstump, pushed towards mid-on
Taylor goes for the slog sweep, doesn't get hold of it, and it flies towards long-on, lands well short of the fielder

Jayasuriya has struck, this is a big blow, New Zealand lose Taylor's big hitting, he was looking to slog it to midwicket, it was a straight delivery, Taylor misses and is hit in front of middle and off, the umpire has his finger up instantly
on the pads, nudged towards square leg for a single
full and just outside off, driven down to long-off for a single
on the pads, worked towards mid-on with soft hands, superb running from the batsmen, convert that into a double
lovely shot from Guptill, full toss on the pads, whipped effortlessly into the stands behind midwicket
great start to the over for New Zealand, high full toss and outside off, Guptill clobbers it past point for four
muscled towards extra cover for a single
length ball just outside off, driven to long-off by Guptill, Mathews comes in from the boundary to cut it off quickly, but his throw isn't collected by the bowler, so there's an overthrow
full and straight, powered back to the bowler, who does the fielding this time
Oram gives himself room and forces an outside off ball towards long-off
slow delivery outside off, Guptill drives it towards mid-off
full ball on the pads, Oram backs away and slams it in the air towards long-on, lands a few yards short of the fielder
Malinga attacks offstump this time, Oram plays it inside-out towards extra cover
slow bouncer well outside off, Guptill drags it towards wide mid-on for a single
full and fast, just outside off, Oram can only dig it out towards  cover
slower bouncer again, 125kmh, outside off, Guptill goes for his favourite pull shot, but he misses the ball
full and outside off, Oram jumps down the pitch and lofts it towards long-off
full toss outside off, Guptill gets a thick outside edge as he slashes at it, the ball races behind backward point for a boundary
Guptill bends his knee as he looks to slog it to midwicket, misses
carved away towards sweeper cover for a couple this time
played uppishly towards long-off, reaches the fielder on the bounce
overpitched on legstump, Oram backs away and opens the face to squeeze it towards backward point for a single
brilliant shot from Oram, what innovation, that was a yorker on middle stump, he opens the face and steers it fine past the keeper for a boundary
this time the yorker keeps Oram to a single, chopped towards backward point
short and wide, Guptill carves it towards point, off the toe end of the bat, Jayasuriya fumbles a couple of times before gathering that one
Oram looks to play a cheeky paddle scoop, inside edge onto his stomach, Oram is in a bit of pain here
great yorker on middle stump, Oram gets it away to backward point for a single
Malinga cleans up Guptill off the last ball, the leg bail is on the ground, full ball again from Malinga, Guptill skipped away beyond leg stump to give himself room, he misses the ball and is bowled
